select us.user_id as userId , us.activated , us.username , us.nickname , us.password from user us where us.username = #{userName}
mapper.insert: insert into user_authority ( user_id , authority_name) values (#{userId} ,#{authorityName})
mapper.select: select us.user_id as userId , us.activated , us.username , us.nickname , us.password , ua.authority_name as authorityName from user us left join user_authority ua on us.user_id = ua.user_id left join authority ath on ua.authority_name = ath.authority_name where us.username = #{userName}
